column1: JOURNAL   Submitted (12-DEC-2008) Los Alamos National Laboratory
JOURNAL   Submitted (04-FEB-2010) J. Craig Venter Institute
REMARK    Amino acid sequence updated by submitter
COMMENT     The Burkholderia pseudomallei 576 isolate was obtained from the
isolated from a 49 year old woman suffering from melioidosis in
1989. In the murine model of disease
and appears to have atypcial LPS. For more information about this
strain contact Richard Titball (rtitball@mail.dstl.gov.uk) at the
The Defence Science and Technology Laboratory or John Dunbar
(dunbar@lanl.gov) at Los Alamos National Laboratory. The authors
wish to acknowledge the Intelligence Technology Innovation Center
for funding the sequencing and the NIH/NIAID for funding the
annotation at Pathema Bioinformatics Resource Center.
The NIAID funded Bioinformatics Resource Center PathoSystems
is responsible for annotation updates of this record.
Annotation was updated on the contigs in February 2010.
/note="identified by match to protein family HMM PF00575;
match to protein family HMM TIGR00717"
